meanings.definition: Able to be classified or categorized.
meanings.sent1: The different types of animals at the zoo are classable based on their habitats.
meanings.sent2: The library has a classable system for organizing books by genre.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a challenge to make the messy room classable for the cleaning crew.
meanings.sent4: Her unique fashion sense was not easily classable into one specific trend.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful stickers to make the classable chart more engaging for the students.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being placed in a particular class or category.
meanings.sent1: The new furniture was classable with the modern decor of the house.
meanings.sent2: The team needed a classable strategy to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful antics made it a classable addition to the family.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was so melodious that it was classable as angelic.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were classable by color, making it easier to solve.
